explanation: [0-0] A hand is holding a green balloon. The balloon is decorated with heart-shaped eyes. Below it is a large red basin filled with golden beads. There is a pair of scissors on the right.

[0-6] Then the person uses the scissors to cut the top of the balloon. The balloon deflates as the air is released. After squeezing it, the person cuts it open, and colorful beads burst out and fall into the basin.
